description: Junichi Nagase, Yuuhi Katagiri and the rest of the school gang all take a summer trip to Karen`s family`s exclusive and isolated tropical island resort. Beach, bathing suits, barbecues and boys - what more can one ask for? Perhaps a normal vacation...

titles.title: It`s the Akane-iro ni Somaru Saka Hardcore OVA, Big Broth...
あかね色に染まる坂 Hardcore
